msg.msgText: A call to setClientID() on a Connection object failed because the client ID was previously set.

msgExplanation.p: The client ID can only be set once on a connection. If the client ID is set in the connection factory properties, setClientID() cannot be called. When used, setClientID() can be called only once.

msgUserResponse.p: Ensure that the client ID is not set before calling setClientID() and that setClientID() is not called more than one time.
